data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 257,789 believers in Sulawesi Selatan, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sulawesi Selatan, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Sulawesi Selatan, Indonesia.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Sulawesi Selatan. Through your servants plant 1,606 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Sulawesi Selatan, Indonesia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Pannei people.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Sulawesi Selatan words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 7,777,011 people in Sulawesi Selatan who are far from you. Please add 1,606 new house churches this year.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sulawesi Selatan, Indonesia has a population of 8,034,800.

We estimate Sulawesi Selatan has 257,789 people who might know Jesus, 647,647 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 7,129,364 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 31 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Sulawesi Selatan, Indonesia to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

location.name: Sulawesi Selatan
